details.sectionContent: This Workshop is conducted by a Category Expert and Researcher wherein the students will be taught to make a Transformer along with a bunch of Complimentary concepts and Technical Skills to get ready for Industrial Level.

Get acquainted with the full fledged In-Detail Tutorial on Transformer & by Building a Transformer with Category Expert & Researcher Mr. Anand Panchbhai. Students will also get the detailed Information and Statistical data of How the Transmission Lines Work & Electrical Power Generation from Water to the one that we use at our Residence.

{{{Topics to be Covered in this Workshop}}}:
\n#What is Transformer? \n#How the Electricity is Generated? #How the Electricity is transmitted from Power station to our House? ( In-Depth). #Industrial Manufacturing Of Transformer. #Industrial Transformer & Heavy Duty Transformers ( In-Detail). {{{WORKFLOW}}}: 1. Full Tutorial on above-mentioned topics. 2. Distribution of Transformer Kits. 3. Instructions & Step by Step Guide to making a Transformer ( Will be taught Individually ). 4. Troubleshooting the Transformer. 5. Check the working Transformer on 230V AC.
